items.sentence: Tom and Mary often talk to each other using Skype.
Tom is the only adult Mary knows who can\'t drive.
Tom isn\'t sure what he wants to do with his life.
I\'d like you to look after my dog while I\'m out.
The police suspect that Tom poisoned Mary\'s food.
The policeman cuffed Tom\'s hands behind his back.
The post office is a few minutes\' walk from here.
The problem is I don\'t know where my umbrella is.
The problem is we\'re not sure Tom can do the job.
The problem is what Tom does when we aren\'t here.
